content.sql: SELECT dbo.fn_getMarsWeekDay(convert(VARCHAR(20),s.bill_date,120)), ddr.dist_name, ds.STORE_CODE, ds.STORE_name, --e.emp_name, ds.linkman, -- ds.STORE_TYPE AS STORE_TYPE, dt.item_name, -------S销售，SR退货 sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) -abs(sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)) AS salesf1, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(t.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) -abs(sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(t.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)) AS salesf2, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(s.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END) -abs(sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(s.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END))AS salesf3, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) AS salesf4, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(t.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) AS salesf5, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Snackfood') THEN isnull(s.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS salesf6, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) -abs(sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)) AS salesf7, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(t.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) -abs(sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(t.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END)) AS salesf8, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY>=0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(s.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END) -abs(sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(s.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END))AS salesf9, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) AS salesf10, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(t.prod_price*dbo.fn_getUnitConvByName(item1.item_name,'箱',t.PROD_CODE,s.PROD_QUANTITY),0) ELSE 0 END) AS salesf11, sum(CASE WHEN s.PROD_QUANTITY<0 AND t1.item_name IN ('Petcare') THEN isnull(s.PROD_AMOUNT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS salesf12 FROM DMS_DATA_SALE s INNER JOIN DMS_CLIENT dc ON s.CLIENT_ID=dc.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_DISTRIBUTOR ddr ON dc.DIST_ID = ddr.DIST_ID INNER JOIN DMS_PROD_MAPPING dpm ON dpm.DIST_PROD_CODE = s.PROD_CODE AND dpm.DIST_PROD_UNIT=s.PROD_UNIT AND s.CLIENT_ID=dpm.CLIENT_ID left join BASE_DICT_ITEM item1 on dpm.TARGET_UNIT_ID = item1.DICT_ITEM_ID INNER JOIN MDM_PRODUCT t ON dpm.TARGET_PROD_CODE = t.PROD_CODE INNER JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM t1 ON t.TYPE_ID=t1.DICT_ITEM_ID INNER JOIN DMS_STORE_MAPPING m ON m.DIST_STORE_CODE = s.STORE_CODE AND m.CLIENT_ID=s.CLIENT_ID INNER JOIN MDM_STORE ds ON ds.STORE_CODE = m.TARGET_STORE_CODE LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM dt ON ds.TYPE_ID=dt.DICT_ITEM_ID inner join base_org org on ddr.org_id=org.org_id WHERE s.state='1' and s.bill_date between (select cal_date from MDM_CALENDAR where cal_year='$year1$' and cal_month='$month1$' and cal_week='$week1$' and cal_day='1') and (select cal_date from MDM_CALENDAR where cal_year='$year1$' and cal_month='$month2$' and cal_week='$week2$' and cal_day='7') $orgSubCode$ $distId$ $distCode$ $prodCode$ $category$ $storeCode$ GROUP BY dbo.fn_getMarsWeekDay(convert(VARCHAR(20),s.bill_date,120)), ddr.dist_name,ds.STORE_CODE,ds.STORE_name,ds.linkman,dt.item_name
